about.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | About Us
about.heading: Discover your neighbourhood with NeighbourlyNest
about.built_by_students: Built by NYP Students, for the Community
about.built_by_students_desc: NeighbourlyNest is a student-driven initiative from NYP, designed to foster trust and togetherness in local neighborhoods through seamless sharing and collaboration.
about.share_more_desc: From borrowing tools to giving away unused items, NeighbourlyNest promotes a culture of sharing, reducing waste, and helping neighbors access what they need.
about.kampung_spirit_desc: Inspired by the kampung spirit, our platform fosters a connected and supportive neighborhood where lending and giving strengthen community ties.

confirmation.title: Confirm Payment
confirmation.success_message: We have successfully received your donation.
confirmation.details_message: Your contribution makes a difference. We appreciate your generosity and support.

donate.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Donate
donate.mandatory_fields: Mandatory fields are indicated with an asterisk (*)
donate.paynow_instructions: Scan the QR code on the left to make your donation. UEN: A12BC3456D. Please indicate the UEN within the transaction so that we can process it as a donation.
donate.cheque_instructions: Please make your cheque payable to NeighbourlyNest and mail it to our headquarters. To ensure prompt processing, please indicate [Your Name/ Donation Purpose] on the back of the cheque.
donate.bank_transfer_instructions: Make your donation via bank transfer to: POSB -- NeighbourlyNest  987-65432-1. Please include [Your Name/ Donation Purpose] in the transaction details so we can identify your donation.
donate.declaration_ack: I acknowledge that the information I have provided in this form is accurate and complete. I understand that my donation is made in support of NeighbourlyNest and will be used solely for that purpose, and I understand that information provided may be used to process this donation but will not be disclosed to any third parties under any and all circumstances.
donate.promotions: I would like to receive email updates about news, promotions, and events.

feedbackbefore.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Feedback
feedbackbefore.alert_message: Thank you {name}, we appreciate your feedback and will get back to you soon at {email}!

feedbackafter.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Feedback
feedbackafter.validation_name: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
feedbackafter.validation_email: Please enter a valid email address.
feedbackafter.validation_message: Message must be at least 10 characters long.

index.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Home
index.welcome_message: Empowering Communities Through Sharing and Sustainability

locate.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Locate Bins
locate.geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
locate.select_bin_type_first: Please select a bin type (E-recycling or Recycling) first.

borrow_free.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Free items & Borrow
borrow_free.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

mission.title: NeighbourlyNest Singapore | Our Mission
mission.subheader: Creating A Nurturing Local Space For Sharing & Caring
mission.fostering_text: We want to bring the true kampong spirit back! NeighbourlyNest strives to create strong bonds through reconnection with neighbours!
mission.encouraging_text: Waste less with NeighbourlyNest, and be part of creating not only a better Singapore, but a better planet. Let's share pre-loved items and resources.
mission.for_singaporeans_text: All it takes is one good deed to start the cycle, and NeighbourlyNest works to create a kinder society for Singaporeans by Singaporeans.

security_2fa.title: Settings (2FA)
security_2fa.two_step_desc: Secure your account by requiring an additional step when logging in
security_2fa.warning_message: Your single-use recovery code can be used to turn off two-step login in the event that you lose access to your two-step login provider. NeighbourlyNest recommends you write it down and keep it safe.
security_2fa.authenticator_app_desc: Enter a code generated by an authenticator app like Google Authenticator.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.warning_message: Proceeding will log you out of your current session, requiring you to log back in. Active sessions on other devices may continue to remain active for up to one hour.

profile_edit.validation_mobile_start: Mobile number must start with 8 or 9.
profile_edit.validation_postal_digits: Postal code must be exactly 6 digits.
